## Download and Install Stan

This section explains how to install Stan for different platforms and interfaces.

It would be great to have a grid for platform / preferred programming interface.

Command-line shell:  good for analysis pipelines, running jobs on clusters.

Actively supported interfaces:

- Python:  CmdStanPy,
- R: CmdStanR,
- Julia:  Stan.jl

Coming soon?  RustStan

Legacy interfaces:

- RStan (latest supported Stan release:  2.32)
- PyStan (supports HMC but not variational inference, not supported for Windows)


MatplotlibStan, StataStan, StrataStan
